channel.title: AsperialX | The Legend
channel.description:
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/64609429/logo.gif[/img] [b][url=http://www.asperialx.com]www.asperialx.com[/url][/b] Brand new server opened yesterday. Main features: - Sound system - Castle wars w/ barricades. - fully world clipping [ npc , combat ] - all skills work , 70 % works flawless. - Hunter with chimchompas , birds , imps. - Party room - Clue scrolls
[b]Castle wars[/b] with barricades. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LWxayZk3U-k&feature=plcp]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LWxayZk3U-k&feature=plcp[/url]
hunter with chimchompas , birds. [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/64609429/Hunter.png[/img]
Quests [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/64609429/quests.png[/img]
Skilling Area [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/64609429/skilling.png[/img]
And theres alot more , [url=http://www.asperialx.com]www.asperialx.com[/url]
